name: Secret Simon
description:
Simon must collect presents to surprise his fellow Yognauts with for secret santa!

You get two minutes to dig down and find presents last minute before secret santa starts! Return to the top in time or miss it!

WASD - Movement

IJKL - Use Tool

E - Place Ladder

Q - Switch Between Pickaxe/Throwable Jaffacake Weapons

Objectives:

- Find three presents you know your fellow yognauts want

- Collect as much gold as you want

- Return to the top before running out of time or when you have all the presents to get your results.

- Place ladders! (E) - 1 gold each!

Engine Used: Unity

Please let us know below what you think!

Made by Levi & Ryan :D
